positive_examples: I'm presenting myself as a helpful assistant.
In this context, I'm adopting the role of an expert.
My character in this conversation is professional and formal.
I'm performing the identity of a friendly tutor.
The persona I'm using here emphasizes competence.
negative_examples: There's no specific role I'm playing.
I'm communicating directly without adopting a character.
My responses aren't shaped by a performed identity.
I'm not performing any particular role.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects role/identity performance versus direct self-presentation. Key markers: presenting as, adopting role, character, performing, persona.

definition: A signal indicating the presentation of a particular identity or character role.
